author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tense moments prevailed at the Slum Clearance Board tenements at Ayanavaram on Saturday night after four men hacked to death a party functionary. The 45-year-old man belonged was a Puthiya Bharatham functionary. The murder took place in full public view.

According to police personnel, Arivazhagan, the party functionary from Villivakkam, resided at the tenements at Pachai Kallu on Veerasamy Street, Ayanavaram. Around 8 p.m., Arivazhagan stepped out of his house with a few friends. All of a sudden some men, who came on two motorcycles, intercepted him.
title: Man hacked to death
